item.description:
Forgot to setup anything for Valentine's Day? Come to this free lunchtime concert (ok to eat during it) and get your b.f./g.f. a bootleg of love-themed music (BYO recorder & legal representation).

If you've been to some of Alexis' past concerts you may have heard professional singers Daniel & Cybil Jones-Juarez. Come hear them and professional pianist/NHCer Alexis in a concert of music all in a Valentine's Day theme of love. Art songs and arias with Alexis accompanying, and piano solos by Alexis (all songs in French or German). Part of the free Bach's Lunch series of lunchtime concerts (oh those musicians are so clever).

Noon at Neighborhood Music School. No more than 1 hr long. If you're late, or have to leave early, please only do so between pieces.

It's ok to eat during the music but please keep it quiet. Crinkly bags/wrappers and giant celery stalks during the music wouldn't be great choices.

Pieces by Strauss, Grieg, Saint-Saens, Duparc, Bizet, & Liszt

POST-PARTY: If anyone's free we'll probably be hanging-out after for food or drink.

HOST: Alexis, cell 203-747-9203 (text is sometimes best). However she will be unreachable for a while before the concert, as she'll be busy warming-up for it. You can also call Jason, 203-901-4957 (texting ok too).

You can hear Alexis (as well as Daniel) at her sites:
www.facebook.com/pages/Alexis-Zingale/41532426738
www.myspace.com/alexiszingalepianist

DIRECTIONS: For directions, click here

PARKING: Don't expect to find available street parking on Audubon St. (which is a 1-way street). Whitney & Grove have street parking, and there are parking garages in the area (including on Audubon).
item.name: Fri. 2/13 - BYO food & romance songs with Alexis
